text: The AirDrop feature offers a special token that can be claimed by users through a unique code format. This code will be provided via Telegram, and users can easily claim their ₹100 by entering the code within the app. Please note, this offer is limited to a select number of users only. Once the code is claimed, the ₹100 will be credited directly to the user's wallet. This exclusive opportunity ensures a smooth, secure, and fast process for users to receive their reward, while maintaining transparency and real-time updates on the transaction status. Join our Telegram channel and receive your exclusive AirDrop code!
